Text:
After installing the program from the ISO, if you get an Error message, that the file "Current_User.mdb" is missing.
To fix that, go to install directory (C:Program Files (x86)McGraw HillBig Yellow German VerbsDatabase), right click on "User_Records.mdb" => Copy and then paste it into folder "C:Users[user]AppDataRoamingMcGrawHill" and rename it to "Current_User.mdb".
That worked for me.
